author: Mohammad Ali
text:
The condolence meet for the murdered VHP leader Arun Mahaur in Agra, which provided a platform for several instances of hate speech last week, was organised on instructions from the RSS, claimed a top local BJP leader on condition of anonymity.

The BJP leader, who has also been booked for hate speech at the meet, claimed his speech was meant to “boost the morale of the workers”.

He also claimed that top functionaries of the RSS, who decide policy, had told the local unit to capitalise on Mahaur’s death, by playing the “Dalit” card.The revelation comes in the backdrop of a demand from the Opposition to sack Ram Shankar Katheria, the Union Minister of State in the HRD Ministry for hate speech. a clear cut
title: RSS behind provocative Agra meet: BJP leader
